Posts.Content: Oct 13, 2011 05:22PM Nell2109 wrote: BMX with permanent implant palcement on Oct 7th.  OMG...everything feels tight.  No pain...just tight.  And I am swollen.  Legs, calves, even my feet.  Anyone have this problem?  Is it normal?
Posts.Title: Post-BMX Swelling? SAOIsenberg Jellydonut

Posts.Content: Oct 27, 2011 06:33PM Nell2109 wrote: vamom: What time is Thanksgiving dinner?  YUUUUUUMY!  My fellow country girl!!!! I too was anxious and made the major mistake of looking all that stuff up online.  I can only speak for myself...but it really isn't as bad as what I saw online.  There were two youtube clips that really settled me.  Courageismystrength and Chachingqueen.   Luckily, my PS is a perfectionist and he gave himself a pat on the back when he came into my hospital room to remove the bandages.  HAHAHAHAHA.  Even I was like D^^^^^^^^^^^MN they look good.  LOL.  Still tight and stiff at times and sleeping on my back SUCKS.  I am a stomach and side sleeper.  I can sort of kind of lay on my sides for short periods of time. Best of luck and prayers to you!!!   STOP SMOKING!!!!  I had to and it made a world of difference.
